title: ‘We’re Aiming for the WorldTour:’ Uno-X Mobility Team Boss
content:
Uno-X’s journey has progressed to qualifying for the Tour de France in 2023. Now the Norwegian team is knocking on the WorldTour’s door.

Read the full article at ‘We’re Aiming for the WorldTour:’ Uno-X Mobility Team Boss on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
